item.title: Love Expressions
item.description: ‘Love Hurts’ & Other Love Expressions February 14 is Valentine’s Day – a day to celebrate love, romance and relationships. But today we will talk about some of the most overused romantic sayings in the English language. Throughout the years, people have used them WAY too much. So, they have come to mean almost nothing. item.title: 2020,one for the History Books
item.description: ###2020 Is Definitely ‘One for the History Books’ It is safe to say that the year 2020 has been “one for the history books.” It stands out.
